Feb 7 (Reuters) - Citigroup Global Markets:: *CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKET AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - OFFERING OF SHARES IN AIRTEL AFRICA *CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKETS - FUNDS MANAGED BY WARBURG PINCUS, MORNINGSTAR INVESTMENT ANNOUNCE INTENTION TO SELL ABOUT 53 MILLION SHARES IN AIRTEL AFRICA *CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKETS LIMITED - PLACING SHARES ARE BEING OFFERED TO INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS BY WAY OF AN ACCELERATED BOOKBUILD


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 07-FEB-202216:48:32.86 GMT
